colleges.name: Indian Institute of Technology Bombay
colleges.description: Indian Institute of Technology Bombay (IIT Bombay) is a public technical and research university located in Powai, Mumbai. It is one of the premier engineering institutions in India.

colleges.name: University of Mumbai
colleges.description: The University of Mumbai, informally known as Mumbai University, is a collegiate public state university located in Mumbai. It offers various undergraduate, postgraduate, and doctoral programs.

colleges.name: Tata Institute of Social Sciences
colleges.description: Tata Institute of Social Sciences (TISS) is a multi-campus public research university located in Mumbai. It is known for its programs in social sciences, social work, and human resources management.

colleges.name: Indian Institute of Technology Delhi
colleges.description: Indian Institute of Technology Delhi (IIT Delhi) is a public technical and research university located in Hauz Khas, Delhi. It is one of the top engineering institutions in India.

colleges.name: University of Delhi
colleges.description: The University of Delhi, informally known as Delhi University, is a collegiate public central university located in New Delhi. It offers a wide range of academic programs.

colleges.name: Jamia Millia Islamia
colleges.description: Jamia Millia Islamia (JMI) is a public central university located in Jamia Nagar, New Delhi. It offers various undergraduate, postgraduate, and doctoral programs.

colleges.name: Indian Institute of Science
colleges.description: Indian Institute of Science (IISc) is a public research university located in Bangalore. It is known for its research contributions in science and engineering.

colleges.name: Bangalore University
colleges.description: Bangalore University is a public state university located in Bangalore. It offers various undergraduate, postgraduate, and doctoral programs.

colleges.name: Indian Institute of Management Bangalore
colleges.description: Indian Institute of Management Bangalore (IIMB) is a public business school located in Bangalore. It is one of the top management institutions in India.

colleges.name: Indian Institute of Technology Hyderabad
colleges.description: Indian Institute of Technology Hyderabad (IIT Hyderabad) is a public technical and research university located in Sangareddy district, Telangana. It is one of the newer IITs established in India.

colleges.name: University of Hyderabad
colleges.description: The University of Hyderabad (UoH) is a public research university located in Hyderabad. It offers various postgraduate and doctoral programs in multiple disciplines.

colleges.name: International Institute of Information Technology Hyderabad
colleges.description: International Institute of Information Technology Hyderabad (IIIT Hyderabad) is a research university located in Hyderabad. It is known for its programs in computer science and information technology.

colleges.name: Indian Institute of Technology Madras
colleges.description: Indian Institute of Technology Madras (IIT Madras) is a public technical and research university located in Chennai. It is one of the top engineering institutions in India.

colleges.name: Anna University
colleges.description: Anna University is a public state university located in Chennai. It offers undergraduate, postgraduate, and doctoral programs in engineering, technology, and applied sciences.

colleges.name: Madras Christian College
colleges.description: Madras Christian College (MCC) is an autonomous college affiliated with the University of Madras. It offers undergraduate and postgraduate programs in arts, science, and commerce.

colleges.name: Indian Institute of Technology Kharagpur
colleges.description: Indian Institute of Technology Kharagpur (IIT Kharagpur) is a public technical and research university located in Kharagpur, West Bengal. It is one of the oldest and largest IITs in India.

colleges.name: University of Calcutta
colleges.description: The University of Calcutta, informally known as Calcutta University, is a collegiate public state university located in Kolkata. It offers a wide range of academic programs.

colleges.name: Jadavpur University
colleges.description: Jadavpur University is a public state university located in Kolkata. It is known for its programs in engineering, technology, arts, and science.

colleges.name: Savitribai Phule Pune University
colleges.description: Savitribai Phule Pune University (SPPU), formerly known as the University of Pune, is a collegiate public state university located in Pune, Maharashtra. It offers a wide range of undergraduate, postgraduate, and doctoral programs.

colleges.name: College of Engineering Pune
colleges.description: College of Engineering Pune (COEP) is an autonomous engineering college affiliated to Savitribai Phule Pune University. It is one of the oldest engineering colleges in Asia.

colleges.name: Symbiosis International University
colleges.description: Symbiosis International University (SIU) is a private deemed university located in Pune, Maharashtra. It is known for its programs in management, law, humanities, and social sciences.

colleges.name: Indian Institute of Management Ahmedabad
colleges.description: Indian Institute of Management Ahmedabad (IIM Ahmedabad) is a public business school located in Ahmedabad, Gujarat. It is one of the premier management institutions in India and is internationally recognized for its academic excellence.

colleges.name: Gujarat University
colleges.description: Gujarat University is a public state university located in Ahmedabad, Gujarat. It offers various undergraduate, postgraduate, and doctoral programs in diverse fields of study.

colleges.name: CEPT University
colleges.description: CEPT University (Centre for Environmental Planning and Technology University) is a private university located in Ahmedabad, Gujarat. It specializes in architecture, planning, and design disciplines.

colleges.name: Malaviya National Institute of Technology
colleges.description: Malaviya National Institute of Technology (MNIT) is a public technical university located in Jaipur, Rajasthan. It offers undergraduate, postgraduate, and doctoral programs in engineering and technology.

colleges.name: University of Rajasthan
colleges.description: The University of Rajasthan is a public state university located in Jaipur, Rajasthan. It offers a wide range of undergraduate, postgraduate, and doctoral programs in various disciplines.

colleges.name: Jaipur National University
colleges.description: Jaipur National University (JNU) is a private university located in Jaipur, Rajasthan. It offers programs in fields such as engineering, management, law, pharmacy, and education.

colleges.name: Sardar Vallabhbhai National Institute of Technology
colleges.description: Sardar Vallabhbhai National Institute of Technology (SVNIT) is a public technical university located in Surat, Gujarat. It offers undergraduate, postgraduate, and doctoral programs in engineering and technology.

colleges.name: Veermata Jijabai Technological Institute
colleges.description: Veermata Jijabai Technological Institute (VJTI) is an autonomous engineering college located in Mumbai, Maharashtra. It offers undergraduate, postgraduate, and doctoral programs in engineering and technology.

colleges.name: Government Engineering College, Surat
colleges.description: Government Engineering College, Surat is a public engineering college located in Surat, Gujarat. It offers undergraduate programs in engineering disciplines.

colleges.name: Panjab University
colleges.description: Panjab University is a public state university located in Chandigarh. It offers a wide range of undergraduate, postgraduate, and doctoral programs in various disciplines including science, engineering, humanities, and social sciences.

colleges.name: PEC University of Technology
colleges.description: PEC University of Technology (formerly Punjab Engineering College) is a public engineering university located in Chandigarh. It specializes in engineering and technology education.

colleges.name: Government Medical College and Hospital, Chandigarh
colleges.description: Government Medical College and Hospital, Chandigarh is a medical college and hospital located in Chandigarh. It offers undergraduate and postgraduate medical education and healthcare services.

colleges.name: Indian Institute of Management Lucknow
colleges.description: Indian Institute of Management Lucknow (IIM Lucknow) is a public business school located in Lucknow, Uttar Pradesh. It is one of the top management institutions in India and offers various postgraduate and doctoral programs in management.

colleges.name: University of Lucknow
colleges.description: The University of Lucknow is a public state university located in Lucknow, Uttar Pradesh. It offers undergraduate, postgraduate, and doctoral programs in various disciplines including arts, science, commerce, and management.

colleges.name: Dr. Ram Manohar Lohia National Law University
colleges.description: Dr. Ram Manohar Lohia National Law University (RMLNLU) is a public law university located in Lucknow, Uttar Pradesh. It offers undergraduate, postgraduate, and doctoral programs in law and legal studies.
